name: The Bounce
description:
What up, Thanks for playing and rating my game! This is my second game jam, worked alone on this, (ps I really want to collab with someone for a future Jam) I created everything 100% besides the music which I made from samples on soundation and used some free sound effect and edited them with Audacity. Art was made by me in Photoshop and created the game with Unity. 

For this game you just gotta bounce around and capture the flag without falling =)
